text:
Hi guys, need help. I just want to make things clear to me. Is it possible passing a JavaScript variable in Hubl?
```let example = 21345
{% set associated_contacts = crm_associations(847943847, 'HubSpot_DEFINED', example, 'limit=3&years_at_company__gt=2&orderBy=email', 'firstname,email', false) %} 
{{ associated_contacts }}```
What I'm trying to do is the example variable will be a dynamic  wherein it will pass to the crm_associations
